mapper.select: select * from WN_QNA where lsnum=#{lsnum} order by qanum desc
mapper.delete: delete from wn_qna where mnum=#{mnum} and qanum=#{qanum}
mapper.update: merge into merge_test q using (select * from wn_qna where qanum = #{qanum}) o on q.qanum is not null when matched then update set q.content = #{content} when not matched then insert into (#{qanum}, #{lsnum}, #{mnum}, #{content}, sysdate) where o.qanum is null;
